/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a concrete barrier, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on one side and towering buildings on the other. A white van is seen driving down the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the urban landscape below.
